title.rendered: Splurge or Steal: Fly Fishing Gear

content.rendered:
Here at AVA Rafting and Ziplining, we have a plethora of different adventure seeking activities from whitewater rafting, to ziplining and rock climbing. If you thought that rafting was our only water based activity, it is my pleasure to inform you that we also offer a few super awesome fly fishing expeditions as well! Our fly fishing trips include all the gear that you will need but if you are looking to purchase some flyfishing gear here in Colorado, be sure to check out these shops.  

 

Buena Vista – Ark Anglers 

Our Granite outpost, located approximately 13 miles from the town of Buena Vista, offers multiple different activities on the Arkansas River. The local fly fishing shop for the Arkansas River is located in Buena Vista and offers an abundance of gear and employs some of the most knowledgeable fishermen with a true John Wayne attitude on customer service. They sell rods, reels, waders, packs, clothing, accessories and more but flies are really what they do best. With over 1500 bins full of the best quality flies they are well suited to find everyone what they need.  

 

Breckenridge – Breckenridge Outfitters 

Breckenridge, being one of the most central towns for whitewater rafting and fly fishing has multiple options when it comes to water activities. The Blue River, being one the most popular rivers for fishing, runs right through the towns of Breckenridge and Silverthorne. Breck Outfitters has been an “Orvis Endorsed Fly Fishing Outfitter” since 2013 offering some of the highest quality gear in the industry including rods, clothing, waders, boots and more. They also offer guided trips, expert recommendations on current river conditions as well as a large selection of flies for purchase.
